text: There are 350 million people with glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase (G6PD) deficiency worldwide. Why is #G6PD deficiency a challenge during the #COVID19 pandemic? Read this published letter to the editor: https://t.co/v29wE1Lmji #coronavirus #chloroquine #hydroxychloroquine https://t.co/1AOXKQCGyG
